title: Processes - Average Value of a Function

content.question: Let <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the function given by <math alttext="f of x, equals, 3 x, times sine x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. What is the average value of <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> on the closed interval <math alttext="1 is less than or equal to x, is less than or equal to 7" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

topic.text: 8.1: Finding the Average Value of a Function on an Interval

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
